newsitem.title: UK: UK Eidos sets share offer of ADS or shares.
newsitem.headline: UK Eidos sets share offer of ADS or shares.

text.p: Eidos Plc said on Friday that it is making an offering of three million ordinary shares in the form of American Depositary Shares (ADSs) or ordinary shares.

British-based Eidos, which develops and publishes interactive software products and advanced video compression technologies, said in a statement that the public offering price is $12.125 per ADS or 732p per ordinary share.
It said that the proceeds from the share offering will be used for acquisitions, internal product development and for working capital.
The offering is being managed by J.P.Morgan & Co.
